response.overview: Shot and edited in New York during the days after September 11, 9.11 listens to the voices of New York City in mourning - a city coming to terms with the aftermath of September 11th and the potential violence of a protracted war. NYC residents respond to the tragedy with spontaneous memorials - public sites of grief and discourse where mourning begins to transform into a mobilization for peace an justice.
response.title: 9.11 Another World is Possible
